title: International Chamber Music Festival
subtitle: 12th Anniversary
cloud_title: Organised by and with the collaboration of
features_text: Find information for this year's Spiritual Resonance festival, including how we plan to celebrate the 12th-anniversary of the Málaga Clásica Festival, the concert program, artist information and talents.
testimonials_text: This year we go all out to celebrate the twelfth anniversary of the Málaga Clásica Festival.
quote_2: The Málaga Clásica Festival delves into the musical 'explosion' of romanticism.
quote_3: There is no chamber music festival like it in Spain so far.
dates_coming: The 2024 Málaga Clásica festival dates will be published soon.
